title: A. Overtaking on the INSIDE of a corner
reason: Front axle at least alongside mirror prior to apex; controlled manner; reasonable line within limits.

reason: Did not have front axle alongside mirror at apex; dived in uncontrolled.

title: B. Overtaking on the OUTSIDE of a corner
reason: Front axle ahead of front axle at apex; controlled from entry to exit; within limits.

title: B. Overtaking on the OUTSIDE of a corner (no entitlement)
reason: Did not have front axle ahead at apex; uncontrolled maneuver.

title: C. Chicanes and S-Bends
reason: Apply inside/outside guides per element; priority to first corner.

title: D. Track Limits
reason: Must use track at all times; no leaving without justification; white lines part of track.

title: D. Track Limits (exceptions)
reason: Left track to avoid collision or due to loss of control; no lasting advantage.

title: E. Impeding
reason: Driven unnecessarily slowly or erratically; potentially dangerous manner.

title: F. Giving back a lasting advantage
reason: Left track and rejoined with advantage; must give back position.

title: G. Moving on the Straight
reason: More than one change of direction to defend; crowded beyond track edge.

title: H. Moving under Braking
reason: Changed direction after deceleration phase commenced; not following racing line.

title: I. Re-joining the Track
reason: Maintained racing speeds in run-off; forced on-track cars to change speed/line.

title: J. Safety Car
reason: Erratic acceleration/braking or maneuvers before restart; endangered others.
